content:
That's really helpful, thank you! I think I need to get a jewelry box with individual compartments to keep everything organized. And I like the idea of rolling my necklaces to prevent tangling. I have a few that are always getting knotted up.

By the way, speaking of necklaces, I lent my pearl necklace to my sister for her job interview two weeks ago. I hope she remembers to give it back to me soon. Do you have any tips on how to politely remind her to return it?
